category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_Update_TC_Objects_On_Upload_Success_workflow
preference.preference_description: Defines the name of the workflow to instantiate when an International Material Data System (IMDS) object data requires custom validation by custom handler before importing the International Material Data System (IMDS) objects to Teamcenter when the "Upload" action is successful. The default value is "IMDS - Update TC Objects on Upload Success".

context.name: Teamcenter
context.value: IMDS - Update TC Objects on Upload Success
